name: Drilbert (itch)
description:
Help Drilbert the Drill Boy fulfill his dream of Drilling as Deep as he can! A little puzzle game where you dig + push. Arrow keys to move. Space to Dig / Drop dirt. All programming and art by @wheybags. Bonus levels by @abregado. Music and SFX from various sources.

Engine used was Love2d (it’s great!). Aseprite for pixel art, and tiled for making levels.

Hints (don't look unless you tried without!)

  • You lose oxygen when the path to the level entrance is blocked

  • You can only hold 3 dirt, and you can drop dirt with space when facing an empty tile
